name: nunjucks-precompile-brunch
readme:
## nunjucks-precompile-brunch
Compiles [Nunjucks](http://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/) template files for use in [brunch](http://brunch.io). Plugin checks for files that have one of the following extensions:

- .html
- .njs


## Usage
Add `"nunjucks-precompile-brunch": "x.y.z"` to `package.json` of your brunch app.

Pick a plugin version that corresponds to your minor (y) brunch version.
